reviewer_notes: Manual frame-by-frame review; timestamps may have minor error. Format uses mm.ss.xx where mm is minutes, ss seconds, xx hundredths.

segments.note: Far shot, far side face, ~2s far back view. m12 timeline had 56.8-60.8 and 66.8-68.8, missing 60.8-66.8 while side/back view transitions.
Pure back view (likely should be excluded).

Small side-face A/B/C (male lead as composition focus).
✅ (m12 timeline 133.2-135.8; starts with small side-face B).

legend.mismatch: Should exist or should be longer; current output misses content.
legend.absent: Reviewer marked as should be excluded.
